body: Hi Kostas, You need to move the test points first and then use them for raytracing. I also modified the way you generate the test points so they don't intersect with the wall. The component also couldn't take untrimmed surfaces into account that I fixed it. Check the attached script and use the raytracing component in this script for the rest of your studies. Hope it helps, Mostapha [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I7biqbcZ7GtmcpoPgyucbYQDuUdlGq-zUuXSV7NUGzJO*8K3ZAdDvNH4-MzE8IRCjVDf9LVWhuhe9i3MHFrtXI3hxg0N1iqu/raytracing_Perspective.png)
